data.text:
Join Glean.ly's next public onboarding, with the creator of Atomic Research method Daniel Pidcock TOMORROW! (March 19th) at 5pm BST. What he will cover: ‚û° Introduction to Atomic Research ‚û° How to set up and use Glean.ly ‚û° How to create an experiment and add data ‚û° Synthesising data ‚û° Time for Q&A included Remote and FREE! Sign up here: https://lnkd.in/d6wPChmC #KnowledgeRepository #AtomicResearch #AtomicUXResearch

On this day in tech history (September 20th): 1878: Thomas Edison patents the phonograph üíΩ, a device capable of recording and playing back sound. [Source: Britannica] 1954: The FORTRAN programming language üíª is invented at IBM. FORTRAN is the first widely used high-level programming language, and it is still used today in scientific and engineering applications. [Source: Computer History Museum] 1983: The RSA encryption algorithm üîê is patented. RSA is one of the most widely used encryption algorithms in the world, and it is used to protect data in transit and at rest. [Source: Britannica] 1998: The first e-mail ‚úâÔ∏è from China is sent to its connection in Germany. This event marked the beginning of China's integration into the global internet. [Source: Facts.net] 2012: The discovery of the Higgs boson üî¨, often referred to as the "God particle," is announced by scientists at the Large Hadron Collider in Switzerland. The Higgs boson is a fundamental particle that is thought to play a role in giving other particles their mass. [Source: Britannica] #TechHistoryWithRowshan #TechHistory #September20 #Phonograph #FORTRAN #RSA #Email #HiggsBoson

https://lnkd.in/gKMK5xJa .....for the math folk's out there......... .............Math Theorem proving Question...... ...............which type of mathematical proof...................... ................1: Proof by 'induction'.........unary 'observation'........ ..........................................................or...................................................... ...............2: Proof by 'contradiction'........Boolean 'observer'...... .............................................or............................................................. ...............3: Proof by .....entangling....1:.......and .....2:.... ..................in a........Gaussian mod(3) field energy calculation .............which type proof is closet to being physically 'true'?

I have developed an behavioral RCA tool - for finding the real root cause for human error related deviations. Introducing the 3BMethod: üß†3 constructs with a total of 8 sub constructs ‚ô•Ô∏èFor deep diving and finding the true cause üß±Putting behavioral science into life science organizations This video introduces the 2nd sub construct within the first construct (informational construct): ConTEXT Book an in-house: https://lnkd.in/d9iGYp2

The new #IPIE has a big week during #UNGA, with multiple briefings on our outputs and findings from our first summer of work. All the technical papers are at www.IPIE.info, but this is the redux: We do know *some* things about how to curb misiniformation on social media, and what knowledge gaps need to be filled: https://lnkd.in/esJSvwcq The world's technology experts are worried about the international trends, though it's not to late for regulators and industry to build a better global information environment: https://lnkd.in/eFvx-Ttp https://lnkd.in/eyn4QDKF
